name: Schooled Resolve
text: Your intensive combat training to fight vampiric forces allows you to fight off their mental spells and effects using your resistance to fear.
benefit: You add your bravery bonus on Will saves against mind-affecting spells and effects from vampires. This does not stack with the normal bravery bonus on saves against fear effects.
text_zh: 你受过专业对抗吸血鬼能力的战斗训练，这允许你使用你对恐惧的抵抗力击败吸血鬼的心灵法术和效果。
benefit_zh: 你在对抗吸血鬼释放的影响心灵的法术和效果的意志豁免中加入英勇职业能力带来的加值。这与通常对抗恐惧的勇气加值不叠。
